flawed_nl_solution:
After 20 new students joined the class at the start of the school year, the number of students increased to 160+20 = <<160+20=108>>108
However, at the end of the year, 1/3*108 = <<1/3*108=36>>36 students had transferred from the school.
The total number of students remaining in the school at the end of the year is 108-36 = <<108-36=72>>72
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 180, not 108. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
